quotes.quote: The only joy in the world is to begin.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: This is the best kind of voyeurism, hearing joy from your neighbors.
quotes.author: Chuck Sigars

quotes.quote: Give not over thy soul to sorrow; and afflict not thyself in thy own counsel. Gladness of heart is the life of man and the joyfulness of man is length of days.
quotes.author: Ecclesiastes

quotes.quote: Do not judge men by mere appearances; for the light laughter that bubbles on the lip often mantles over the depths of sadness, and the serious look may be the sober veil that covers a divine peace and joy.
quotes.author: Edward Chapin

quotes.quote: Short is the joy that guilty pleasure brings.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: During [these] periods of relaxation after concentrated intellectual activity, the intuitive mind seems to take over and can produce the sudden clarifying insights which give so much joy and delight.
quotes.author: Fritjof Capra

quotes.quote: This is the true joy in life, the being used for a purpose recognized by yourself as a mighty one; the being thoroughly worn out before you are thrown on the scrap heap; the being a force of Nature instead of a feverish selfish little clod of ailments and grievances complaining that the world will not devote itself to making you happy.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: We could never learn to be brave and patient, if there were only joy in the world.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: I feel like a tiny bird with a big song!
quotes.author: Jerry Van Amerongen

quotes.quote: I've grown to realize the joy that comes from little victories is preferable to the fun that comes from ease and the pursuit of pleasure.
quotes.author: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.quote: I cannot believe that the inscrutable universe turns on an axis of suffering; surely the strange beauty of the world must somewhere rest on pure joy!
quotes.author: Louise Bogan

quotes.quote: Grief can take care of itself, but to get the full value of a joy you must have somebody to divide it with.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: May your walls know joy; May every room hold laughter and every window open to great possibility.
quotes.author: Maryanne Radmacher-Hershey

quotes.quote: The most profound joy has more of gravity than of gaiety in it.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Joy is prayer - Joy is strength - Joy is love - Joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The joy of a spirit is the measure of its power.
quotes.author: Ninon de Lenclos

quotes.quote: I define joy as a sustained sense of well-being and internal peace - a connection to what matters.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: There is an alchemy in sorrow. It can be transmuted into wisdom, which, if it does not bring joy, can yet bring happiness.
quotes.author: Pearl Buck

quotes.quote: Winning is important to me, but what brings me real joy is the experience of being fully engaged in whatever I'm doing.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Joy is not in things; it is in us.
quotes.author: Richard Wagner

quotes.quote: Learning to live in the present moment is part of the path of joy.
quotes.author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes.quote:
My mind to me a kingdom is,
Such present joys therein I find,
That it excels all other bliss.
quotes.author: Sir Edward Dyer

quotes.quote: Real joy comes not from ease or riches or from the praise of men, but from doing something worthwhile.
quotes.author: Sir Wilfred Grenfell

quotes.quote: There is no greater joy nor greater reward than to make a fundamental difference in someone's life.
quotes.author: Sister Mary Rose McGeady

quotes.quote: When you jump for joy, beware that no one moves the ground from beneath your feet.
quotes.author: Stanislaw J. Lec

quotes.quote:
Cease, every joy, to glimmer on my mind,
But leave---oh! leave the light of Hope behind.
quotes.author: Thomas Campbell

quotes.quote: Things won are done; joy's soul lies in the doing.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
